comment: Professor Cook is a really inspirational teacher. Shes very passionate about the field and I learned a lot from her this year. You will have to put in the work but its worth it you get a lot out of the class. Hope I get to take her again.

Awful. Takes forever to take attendance which doesnt work in your favors towards the grade. She also popcorn reads all PowerPoints. You will have to teach yourself everything because she isnt knowledgeable about the subject.
